title: Pixel keeps rebooting
content:
Yesterday when charging, my pixel suddenly begin to keep rebooting continuously. Only by entering the fastboot menu and click "power off" when it is not charging could I shut it down. Then, I have tried:
1. apply a rescue OTA to it but could not go on at a certain step.
2. click "restart bootloader" in fastboot menu to factory reset it, but it did not respond.
3. take out the SIM card and try 1 & 2
none worked. Wish I can get some help here :)
